text: In the seventh year, Jehoiada11:4. Jehoiada was the high priest. sent for the commanders of hundreds, the Carites,11:4. “Carites”: probably foreign mercenaries used as the royal guard. and the guards, and brought them into the Lord's Temple. He made an agreement with them and made them swear an oath. There in the Lord's Temple he showed them the king's son
